entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
